snippet: The chemist pleaded guilty to using confidential information about drug applications pending with the Food and Drug Administration to make nearly $4 million in illegal trading profits.
abstract: The chemist pleaded guilty to using confidential information about drug applications pending with the Food and Drug Administration to make nearly $4 million in illegal trading profits.

headline.main: Ex-F.D.A. Chemist Sentenced to 5 Years in Insider Case
